name: @smooth_zhz/generate_node-core
description: A flexible code generation tool with configurable templates and settings

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish
